Case# NSTableView.SelectionHighlightStyle.sourceList

macOS 10.5–12.0Deprecated

```
case sourceList
```

Deprecated

Set the NSTableView.style property to NSTableViewStyleSourceList instead.

## [Discussion](/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView/SelectionHighlightStyle-swift.enum/sourceList#Discussion)

The source list style of NSTableView. On 10.5, a light blue gradient is used to highlight selected rows.

Note

 When using this style, cell subclasses that implement `drawsBackground` must set the value to [`false`](/documentation/Swift/false). Otherwise, the cells will draw over the tableview’s highlighting.
